name: LP
description:
In the game you have to rotate the level and guide the Panda to collect coins.
The main character is Panda.
The panda is very curious and courageous in his supercocon he is able to withstand falls from great heights and can travel enormous distances.
You have to rotate the level, solve puzzles and, of course, collect coins.

Game features:
  • Level Rotation Adventure
  • Collecting coins
  • Convenient management
  • Difficult levels
  • Physics, doors, keys and traps.
